title: Sajid Javid – 2022 Comments on the Innovative Medicines Fund
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sajid Javid, the Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 7 June 2022.
content:
I want NHS patients to be the first in the world to access the most promising and revolutionary treatments that could extend or save their lives.
